item.title: The Woeful Melody of "Game Over" from "Final Fantasy I"
item.description: How is “Game Over” from “Final Fantasy I” able to evoke a sense of losing and game being over using a generic descending-fifths sequence?

item.title: The "Wrong-Note" Prelude of Final Fantasy I (1987 NES)
item.description: The very original NES prelude way back in 1987 from Final Fantasy I behaves differently from the ones to follow, as we’ll se Nobuo himself demonstrating. I hear a swirling kaleidoscope in the inverted arpeggios, so I cover them with the guitar. Let’s peek into the colored glass and some untapped game music potential.
